speaker: President.
english: President. Mr President-in-Office, I believe I can say on behalf of Parliament that we shall deliver our opinion quickly if due consideration is given to the rights of the European Parliament. On that basis we are willing to cooperate closely wherever we can.
original: President. Mr President-in-Office, I believe I can say on behalf of Parliament that we shall deliver our opinion quickly if due consideration is given to the rights of the European Parliament. On that basis we are willing to cooperate closely wherever we can.
agenda_item: Roadmap for the European Union's constitutional process (debate)
